title: Illustrator advanced typography: ATypI exclusive
content:
[http://www.atypi.org/40\_conferences/28\_Vancouver/40\_timetables/view\_presentation\_html?presentid=58](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018012245/http:/www.atypi.org/40_conferences/28_Vancouver/40_timetables/view_presentation_html?presentid=58)   
   
The mask is off. If you hadn't guessed the identity of the mystery Adobe application being previewed at this year's ATypI conference, Thomas Phinney today confirms that it is a new Illustrator, complete with Unicode text support, OpenType Layout features, and reportedly the most advanced typography UI in any application.   
   
At 9:35 on Sunday, September 28th, Thomas will present 'the first public technology preview of this future version of Illustrator', exclusively for attendees of the ATypI conference.   
   
   
John Hudson, conference programme organiser
author: John Hudson
